Item.comments: Gets the value of specific HCAras Property
Item.method_code:
'MethodTemplateName=VBMain;
' Gets the value for the name "inputName" in the HC Properties
Function Main() As Item Dim inn as Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim inputName As String = Me.node.InnerText Dim value As String = GetValue(inputName) Dim result As Item = inn.newResult(value) Return result End Function
Private Function GetValue(ByVal propertyName As String) As String Try Dim myProp As Item = GetPropertyItem(propertyName) Dim value As String = myProp.getProperty("value", "") Return value Catch ex As Exception CCO.Utilities.WriteDebug("ERROR_HC_GetPropertyValue_Generic", ex.ToString()) Return "" End Try End Function
Private Function GetPropertyItem(ByVal name As String) As Item Dim amlQuery As New StringBuilder amlQuery.Append("<AML><Item action='get' type='HC Properties' >") amlQuery.AppendFormat("<name condition='eq'>{0}</name>", name) amlQuery.Append("</Item></AML>") Dim result = Me.getInnovator().applyAML(amlQuery.ToString) Return result End Function
